alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Saline (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 6:06PM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Saline and northwestern Gallatin Counties through 630 PM CST... At 605 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Carrier Mills, or near Harrisburg, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Equality around 625 PM CST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Ridgway. The storm should stay just south of Harrisburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
